name: Healer (pisito)
description:
Healer is a simple endless-arena game but this time you play as a healer !

Control :  Skill 1QSkill 2WSkill 4RCast SkillsLeft Mouse Button ( after pressed Q/W/R )MoveRight Mouse Button

* Skill 3 is a passive skill.

How to play :

1. You will face endless waves of enemies ! the higher the wave the more  and stronger enemies. 

2. Enemies come in all direction.

3. You can not attack in this game but you have your knights to protect you instead! try to keep them alive by healing them.

4. Each slayed enemy will give you EXP points  to  leveling up.

5. When you level up you will allow to pick a skill that you want to upgrade from 3 random skills.

6. There is only 1 condition to lose that is you running out of HP !

*Be careful there is NO way you can restore your own HP.

Skills : 

From Left to Right in the game.

Skill 1Cast HealingSkill 2Cast Healing Pool (AOE)Skill 3Increase all knights max HPSkill 4Revive
